statusList.Name: Disoriented
statusList.Description: Lowers the enemy's dexterity by 20%, making them less likely to dodge attacks.

statusList.Name: Burned
statusList.Description: Inflicts damage over time, reducing the enemy's current health by 5 points each turn.

statusList.Name: Paralyzed
statusList.Description: Reduces the enemy's strength by 25%, decreasing their damage output.

statusList.Name: Cloaked
statusList.Description: Increases the player's dexterity by 30%, improving evasion and accuracy.

statusList.Name: Healing
statusList.Description: Heals the player, restoring 20 points of current health instantly.

statusList.Name: Hacked
statusList.Text: Reduces the enemy's intelligence by 30%, impairing their ability to use special attacks effectively.

statusList.Name: Stunned
statusList.Description: Stuns the enemy, reducing their charisma by 10 points and preventing them from using charm-based abilities.

statusList.Name: DefenceBoost
statusList.Description: Provides a temporary boost to the player's constitution by 20%, increasing overall defense.
